headline: Leidos Expands DODNet Contract As Long Term Defense IT Story Builds
summary: Leidos Holdings (NYSE:LDOS) is expanding its DODNet migration work to eight additional Department of Defense agencies. The expansion covers more than 100,000 users under an existing US$11.5b, 10 year digital modernization contract. This phase marks a key step in consolidating Defense Department information networks and upgrading cybersecurity across participating agencies. For you as an investor, this update sits at the intersection of defense, cybersecurity, and large scale government IT...
